text: Claude Dauphin (10 June, 1951 - September 30, 2015) was a French billionaire businessman, and executive chairman of Trafigura Beheer BV. He had served as Trafigura's chairman and CEO. In March 2013 his net wealth was estimated at $1 billion by Forbes. Dauphin died in the early hours of September 30, 2015 in a hospital in Bogota, Colombia from cancer, aged 64. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Colombia Category:French businesspeople
title: Claude Dauphin (businessman)
